entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
